name: anytype
title: Anytype
description: Create, browse and search in Anytype - right at your fingertips, anywhere on your Mac.
author: jmetrikat

commands.name: browse-spaces
commands.title: Browse Spaces
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Browse your spaces one by one.

commands.name: search-anytype
commands.title: Search Anytype
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Search objects globally in all spaces.

tools.name: add-to-list
tools.title: Add to List
tools.description: Add an object to a specific list in a specific space.

tools.name: create-object
tools.title: Create Object
tools.description: Create a Anytype object of a specific type in a specific space.

tools.name: get-members
tools.title: Get Members
tools.description: Get all members of a specific space.

tools.name: get-object
tools.title: Get Object
tools.description: Get the content of a specific object.

tools.name: get-types
tools.title: Get Types
tools.description: Get types in a specific space.

tools.name: search-anytype
tools.title: Search Anytype
tools.description: Search for objects globally in all spaces.

tools.name: search-space
tools.title: Search Space
tools.description: Search for objects in a specific space.

tools.name: solve-challenge
tools.title: Solve Challenge
tools.description: Complete the pairing process with the Anytype desktop app.

tools.name: start-challenge
tools.title: Start Challenge
tools.description: Start the pairing process with the Anytype desktop app.

evals.input: @anytype add all objects of type 'task' to my to-do list in my personal space

search-space.name: First Task
search-space.snippet: This is the snippet of the task.

search-space.name: Another Task
search-space.snippet: This is the snippet of another task.

search-space.name: To-Do List
search-space.snippet: This is the snippet of the list.

evals.input: @anytype create a new page in my personal space explaining the concept of privacy

create-object.name: First Page
create-object.snippet: This is the snippet of the object.

evals.input: @anytype how many members are in my personal space?
@anytype get all types in my personal space

search-anytype.name: First Object
search-anytype.snippet: This is the snippet of the object.

search-anytype.name: Another Object
search-anytype.snippet: This is the snippet of another object.

evals.input: @anytype search for recently modified objects in my personal space

search-space.name: First Object
search-space.snippet: This is the snippet of the object.

search-space.name: Another Object
search-space.snippet: This is the snippet of another object.

preferences.name: anytypeApp
preferences.title: Anytype App
preferences.description: The Anytype app on your Mac.

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.title: Primary Action
preferences.description: Choose the primary action when an object is selected.

preferences.name: sort
preferences.title: Sort Order
preferences.description: The sort order of objects when displayed as a list.

preferences.name: limit
preferences.title: API Limit
preferences.description: The maximum number of objects to fetch from the Anytype API at once. Be careful when changing this, as a large number can cause performance issues.

preferences.name: linkDisplay
preferences.title: Link Display
preferences.description: Choose how to display URLs and email addresses in sidebar: as plain text or as clickable links.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
